appSubDirectory.description: The subdirectory path for the API application
appSubDirectory.x-prompt: Specify the subdirectory for your API application (will be placed in the applications directory)

lambdaStack.description: Project containing Lambda functions to import (optional). If not specified, Lambda functions will be created in this project.

customDomainStack.description: Project containing custom domain configuration (optional). If specified, the API will be configured with a custom domain.
customDomainStack.x-prompt: Which project contains the custom domain configuration? (optional)
